job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce has a client that is seeking a Data Analyst in Corona, California (CA).

Summary:
We are looking for a self-sufficient, independent, self-starter and adaptable Data Analytic Consultant to join us on our journey to improve the member experience. You will help us discover information hidden in vast amounts of data. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, performing statistical analysis, and building models to help provide actionable insights.

Duties:
  • Provide data architectural leadership in developing enterprise data/process models, and logical/physical database designs
  • Provide data and database development, maintenance, and production support
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Ability to provide actionable insights from data mining, statistical modeling, segmentation, customer profiling and quantitative/qualitative analyses with the goal of improving the member experience, while making health care more affordable
  • Ability to develop experience dashboards to monitor existing programs and ensure that execution is aligned with objectives
  • In-depth and extensive knowledge of statistical techniques and tool including but not limited to regressions, cluster analysis, factor analysis, and survival analysis
  • Hands on experience with structured and unstructured data sets
  • Hands on experience with SQL, Alteryx, Excel, and Tableau
  • Excellent SQL skills including writing complex queries, and expertise in data warehousing, data services development and business intelligence tools. Expertise using Hadoop technologies is a plus
  • Excellent skills using statistical packages including Alteryx, SAS, R or Python for data processing and modeling
  • Excellent presentation, simplification and storytelling skills
  • Excellent stakeholder engagement and influencing skills
  • Excellent project management skills to build and execute project plans with clearly defined deliverables, timelines, and ownerships. Provide prompt and timely update with progress, issues, and risk mitigations
  • Demonstrated strong sense of urgency with ability to juggle multiple projects
Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
